text: Eghtɨ gumazitam o amizitam Godɨn damazimɨn gumazir aghuimɨn mɨn otivsɨ, a manmaghɨn damuam? An arazir aghuim bagh pamten ingaran markɨ. Puvatɨ. A nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn ikɨ suam, God arazir kurabagh amizir gumazim dɨpon suam, nɨ nan damazimɨn dera. God gumazir kam o amizir kamɨn nɨghnɨzir gavgavimɨn garava a mega ghaze, nɨ nan damazimɨn dera.
